scripts.zip: zip -r lambda.zip index.js src node_modules package.json package-lock.json .gitignore
scripts.update:faas:prod: aws lambda update-function-code --function-name mxfactorial-graphql-server-prod --zip-file fileb://$(pwd)/lambda.zip --region us-east-1
scripts.update:faas:qa: aws lambda update-function-code --function-name mxfactorial-graphql-server-qa --zip-file fileb://$(pwd)/lambda.zip --region us-east-1
scripts.update:faas:dev: aws lambda update-function-code --function-name mxfactorial-graphql-server-dev --zip-file fileb://$(pwd)/lambda.zip --region us-east-1
scripts.deploy:prod: yarn install && yarn run zip && yarn run update:faas:prod
scripts.deploy:qa: yarn install && yarn run zip && yarn run update:faas:qa
scripts.deploy:dev: yarn install && yarn run zip && yarn run update:faas:dev
scripts.cp:lambda: echo "copying over to terraform" && yarn install && yarn run zip && cp lambda.zip ../terraform/environments/common-bin/graphql/lambda.zip
scripts.test:prod: JEST_ENV=prod node tests/utils/warmUp.js && JEST_ENV=prod AWS_REGION=us-east-1 jest --detectOpenHandles
scripts.test:qa: JEST_ENV=qa node tests/utils/warmUp.js && JEST_ENV=qa AWS_REGION=us-east-1 jest --detectOpenHandles
scripts.test:dev: JEST_ENV=dev node tests/utils/warmUp.js && JEST_ENV=dev AWS_REGION=us-east-1 jest --detectOpenHandles
